Package bll

Class BLLFacade

java.lang.Object
bll.BLLFacade
All Implemented Interfaces:
bll.bookbll.IBookBO, bll.IBLLFacade, bll.poembll.IImportPoemBO, bll.poembll.IPoemBO, bll.rootbll.IRootBO, bll.tokenize.ITokenizeBO, bll.versebll.IVerseBO
public class BLLFacade extends Object implements bll.IBLLFacade
This class implements the business logic layer facade interface (IBLLFacade). It serves as an intermediary between the presentation layer and the data access layer.

    • addOrUpdateRoute

      public boolean addOrUpdateRoute(String root, int tokenid, int verseId, String status) throws SQLException
      Description copied from interface: bll.rootbll.IRootBO
      Adds or updates a route with the specified parameters.
      Specified by:
      addOrUpdateRoute in interface bll.rootbll.IRootBO
      Parameters:
      root - The root of the route.
      tokenid - The token ID associated with the route.
      verseId - The verse ID associated with the route.
      status - The status of the route.
      Returns:
      True if the operation is successful, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
